languages.text:
Cyber Mastif has +25 Weapon Skill and Strength, and +400% Damage
New Active Ability: {g|f:6087d39917384fea9ad6ffc479bacc92}Recall!{/g} – force the Cyber Mastiff to move to the Overseer’s location, adding bonus based on its status and making it Waiting.

traits.locale_text:
Cyber Mastif has +25 Weapon Skill and Strength, and +400% Damage
New Active Ability: {g|f:6087d39917384fea9ad6ffc479bacc92}Recall!{/g} – force the Cyber Mastiff to move to the Overseer’s location, adding bonus based on its status and making it Waiting.

languages.text:
The cyber-mastiff gains +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} and deals +400% more damage.
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} gains the {g|f:6087d39917384fea9ad6ffc479bacc92}Heel!{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}.
